item.title: The Bat
item.description: Master Bryce is throwing a party. As his most faithful servant, that means it’s your job to make the party run smoothly. But you only have two handsâ€”and far too many duties. You’ll have to manage requests from the guests, the master’s eccentric demands, and your own composure. All the other staff have quit, unwilling to entertain the master’s “moods,” but you’ve served Wyatt Manor for decades; what’s one more evening?
